text: Colonel John Llewellyn Waddy OBE (17 June 1920 â€“ 27 September 2020) was a British Army officer. He was born in Taunton, Somerset, England. He was in World War II, Palestine and the Malayan Emergency before becoming Colonel of the SAS. Waddy died on 27 September 2020, aged 100.Laatste Airborne-officier John Waddy op 100-jarige leeftijd overleden ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British military personnel of World War II Category:English centenarians Category:People from Somerset
title: John Waddy (British Army officer)
